AllocateStaticIp.name: AllocateStaticIp
AllocateStaticIp.description: Creates a static IP address that can be attached to an instance.

AttachDisk.name: AttachDisk
AttachDisk.description: Attaches a disk to an instance.

AttachInstancesToLoadBalancer.name: AttachInstancesToLoadBalancer
AttachInstancesToLoadBalancer.description: Attaches one or more instances to a load balancer.

AttachLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.name: AttachLoadBalancerTlsCertificate
AttachLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.description: Attaches a TLS certificate to a load balancer.

AttachStaticIp.name: AttachStaticIp
AttachStaticIp.description: Attaches a static IP address to an instance.

CloseInstancePublicPorts.name: CloseInstancePublicPorts
CloseInstancePublicPorts.description: Closes a public port of an instance.

CopySnapshot.name: CopySnapshot
CopySnapshot.description: Copies a snapshot from one AWS Region to another in Amazon Lightsail.

CreateCloudFormationStack.name: CreateCloudFormationStack
CreateCloudFormationStack.description: Creates a new Amazon EC2 instance from an exported Amazon Lightsail snapshot.

CreateDomain.name: CreateDomain
CreateDomain.description: Creates a domain resource for the specified domain name.

CreateDomainEntry.name: CreateDomainEntry
CreateDomainEntry.description:
Creates one or more DNS record entries for a domain resource: Address (A), canonical
                                                name (CNAME), mail exchanger (MX), name server (NS), start of authority (SOA), service
                                                locator (SRV), or text (TXT).

CreateInstancesFromSnapshot.name: CreateInstancesFromSnapshot
CreateInstancesFromSnapshot.description: Creates one or more instances based on an instance snapshot.

CreateKeyPair.name: CreateKeyPair
CreateKeyPair.description: Creates a key pair used to authenticate and connect to an instance.

CreateLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.name: CreateLoadBalancerTlsCertificate
CreateLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.description: Creates a load balancer TLS certificate.

CreateRelationalDatabaseFromSnapshot.name: CreateRelationalDatabaseFromSnapshot
CreateRelationalDatabaseFromSnapshot.description: Creates a new relational database from a snapshot.

DeleteDomain.name: DeleteDomain
DeleteDomain.description: Deletes a domain resource and all of its DNS records.

DeleteDomainEntry.name: DeleteDomainEntry
DeleteDomainEntry.description: Deletes a DNS record entry for a domain resource.

DeleteKeyPair.name: DeleteKeyPair
DeleteKeyPair.description: Deletes a key pair used to authenticate and connect to an instance.

DeleteKnownHostKeys.name: DeleteKnownHostKeys
DeleteKnownHostKeys.description:
Deletes the known host key or certificate used by the Amazon Lightsail browser-based
                                                SSH or RDP clients to authenticate an instance.

DeleteLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.name: DeleteLoadBalancerTlsCertificate
DeleteLoadBalancerTlsCertificate.description: Deletes a load balancer TLS certificate.

DetachDisk.name: DetachDisk
DetachDisk.description: Detaches a disk from an instance.

DetachInstancesFromLoadBalancer.name: DetachInstancesFromLoadBalancer
DetachInstancesFromLoadBalancer.description: Detaches one or more instances from a load balancer.

DetachStaticIp.name: DetachStaticIp
DetachStaticIp.description: Detaches a static IP from an instance to which it is attached.

DownloadDefaultKeyPair.name: DownloadDefaultKeyPair
DownloadDefaultKeyPair.description:
Downloads the default key pair used to authenticate and connect to instances in a
                                                specific AWS Region.

ExportSnapshot.name: ExportSnapshot
ExportSnapshot.description: Exports an Amazon Lightsail snapshot to Amazon EC2.

GetActiveNames.name: GetActiveNames
GetActiveNames.description: Returns the names of all active (not deleted) resources.

GetBlueprints.name: GetBlueprints
GetBlueprints.description:
Returns a list of instance images, or blueprints. You can use a blueprint to create
                                                a new instance already running a specific operating system, as well as a pre-installed
                                                application or development stack. The software that runs on your instance depends
                                                on the blueprint you define when creating the instance.

GetBundles.name: GetBundles
GetBundles.description:
Returns a list of instance bundles. You can use a bundle to create a new instance
                                                with a set of performance specifications, such as CPU count, disk size, RAM size,
                                                and network transfer allowance. The cost of your instance depends on the bundle you
                                                define when creating the instance.

GetCloudFormationStackRecords.name: GetCloudFormationStackRecords
GetCloudFormationStackRecords.description:
Returns information about all CloudFormation stacks used to create Amazon EC2 resources
                                                from exported Amazon Lightsail snapshots.

GetDiskSnapshot.name: GetDiskSnapshot
GetDiskSnapshot.description: Returns information about a disk snapshot.

GetDiskSnapshots.name: GetDiskSnapshots
GetDiskSnapshots.description: Returns information about all disk snapshots.

GetDomain.name: GetDomain
GetDomain.description: Returns DNS records for a domain resource.

GetDomains.name: GetDomains
GetDomains.description: Returns DNS records for all domain resources.

GetExportSnapshotRecords.name: GetExportSnapshotRecords
GetExportSnapshotRecords.description:
Returns information about all records to export Amazon Lightsail snapshots to Amazon
                                                EC2.

GetInstanceAccessDetails.name: GetInstanceAccessDetails
GetInstanceAccessDetails.description: Returns temporary keys you can use to authenticate and connect to an instance.

GetInstanceMetricData.name: GetInstanceMetricData
GetInstanceMetricData.description: Returns the data points for the specified metric of an instance.

GetInstancePortStates.name: GetInstancePortStates
GetInstancePortStates.description: Returns the port states of an instance.

GetInstanceSnapshot.name: GetInstanceSnapshot
GetInstanceSnapshot.description: Returns information about an instance snapshot.

GetInstanceSnapshots.name: GetInstanceSnapshots
GetInstanceSnapshots.description: Returns information about all instance snapshots.

GetInstanceState.name: GetInstanceState
GetInstanceState.description: Returns the state of an instance.

GetKeyPair.name: GetKeyPair
GetKeyPair.description: Returns information about a key pair.

GetKeyPairs.name: GetKeyPairs
GetKeyPairs.description: Returns information about all key pairs.

GetLoadBalancer.name: GetLoadBalancer
GetLoadBalancer.description: Returns information about a load balancer.

GetLoadBalancerMetricData.name: GetLoadBalancerMetricData
GetLoadBalancerMetricData.description: Returns the data points for the specified metric of a load balancer.

GetLoadBalancerTlsCertificates.name: GetLoadBalancerTlsCertificates
GetLoadBalancerTlsCertificates.description: Returns information about a load balancer TLS certificate.

GetOperation.name: GetOperation
GetOperation.description:
Returns information about an operation. Operations include events such as when you
                                                create an instance, allocate a static IP, attach a static IP, and so on.

GetOperations.name: GetOperations
GetOperations.description:
Returns information about all operations. Operations include events such as when you
                                                create an instance, allocate a static IP, attach a static IP, and so on.

GetRegions.name: GetRegions
GetRegions.description: Returns a list of all valid AWS Regions for Amazon Lightsail.

GetRelationalDatabase.name: GetRelationalDatabase
GetRelationalDatabase.description: Returns information about a relational database.

GetRelationalDatabaseBlueprints.name: GetRelationalDatabaseBlueprints
GetRelationalDatabaseBlueprints.description:
Returns a list of relational database images, or blueprints. You can use a blueprint
                                                to create a new database running a specific database engine. The database engine that
                                                runs on your database depends on the blueprint you define when creating the relational
                                                database.

GetRelationalDatabaseBundles.name: GetRelationalDatabaseBundles
GetRelationalDatabaseBundles.description:
Returns a list of relational database bundles. You can use a bundle to create a new
                                                database with a set of performance specifications, such as CPU count, disk size, RAM
                                                size, network transfer allowance, and standard of high availability. The cost of your
                                                database depends on the bundle you define when creating the relational database.

GetRelationalDatabaseEvents.name: GetRelationalDatabaseEvents
GetRelationalDatabaseEvents.description: Returns events for a relational database.

GetRelationalDatabaseLogEvents.name: GetRelationalDatabaseLogEvents
GetRelationalDatabaseLogEvents.description: Returns events for the specified log stream of a relational database.

GetRelationalDatabaseLogStreams.name: GetRelationalDatabaseLogStreams
GetRelationalDatabaseLogStreams.description: Returns the log streams available for a relational database.

GetRelationalDatabaseMasterUserPassword.name: GetRelationalDatabaseMasterUserPassword
GetRelationalDatabaseMasterUserPassword.description: Returns the master user password of a relational database.

GetRelationalDatabaseMetricData.name: GetRelationalDatabaseMetricData
GetRelationalDatabaseMetricData.description: Returns the data points for the specified metric of a relational database.

GetRelationalDatabaseParameters.name: GetRelationalDatabaseParameters
GetRelationalDatabaseParameters.description: Returns the parameters of a relational database.

GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshot.name: GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshot
GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshot.description: Returns information about a relational database snapshot.

GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshots.name: GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshots
GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshots.description: Returns information about all relational database snapshots.

GetRelationalDatabases.name: GetRelationalDatabases
GetRelationalDatabases.description: Return information about all relational databases.

GetStaticIp.name: GetStaticIp
GetStaticIp.description: Returns information about a static IP.

GetStaticIps.name: GetStaticIps
GetStaticIps.description: Returns information about all static IPs.

ImportKeyPair.name: ImportKeyPair
ImportKeyPair.description: Imports a public key from a key pair.

IsVpcPeered.name: IsVpcPeered
IsVpcPeered.description:
Returns a boolean value indicating whether the Amazon Lightsail virtual private cloud
                                                (VPC) is peered.

OpenInstancePublicPorts.name: OpenInstancePublicPorts
OpenInstancePublicPorts.description: Adds, or opens a public port of an instance.

PeerVpc.name: PeerVpc
PeerVpc.description: Tries to peer the Amazon Lightsail virtual private cloud (VPC) with the default VPC.

PutInstancePublicPorts.name: PutInstancePublicPorts
PutInstancePublicPorts.description:
Sets the specified open ports for an instance, and closes all ports for every protocol
                                                not included in the request.

RebootInstance.name: RebootInstance
RebootInstance.description: Reboots an instance that is in a running state.

RebootRelationalDatabase.name: RebootRelationalDatabase
RebootRelationalDatabase.description: Reboots a relational database that is in a running state.

StartInstance.name: StartInstance
StartInstance.description: Starts an instance that is in a stopped state.

StartRelationalDatabase.name: StartRelationalDatabase
StartRelationalDatabase.description: Starts a relational database that is in a stopped state.

StopInstance.name: StopInstance
StopInstance.description: Stops an instance that is in a running state.

StopRelationalDatabase.name: StopRelationalDatabase
StopRelationalDatabase.description: Stops a relational database that is in a running state.

UnpeerVpc.name: UnpeerVpc
UnpeerVpc.description:
Attempts to unpeer the Amazon Lightsail virtual private cloud (VPC) from the default
                                                VPC.

UpdateDomainEntry.name: UpdateDomainEntry
UpdateDomainEntry.description: Updates a domain recordset after it is created.

UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute.name: UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute
UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute.description: Updates a load balancer attribute, such as the health check path and session stickiness.

UpdateRelationalDatabaseParameters.name: UpdateRelationalDatabaseParameters
UpdateRelationalDatabaseParameters.description: Updates the parameters of a relational database.
